研究表明，西班牙女性的月经不适感很高西班牙国家研究委员会（CSIC）的联合中心和政治上的政治中心（UPV）的一项研究，UPV的应用数学系和西澳大利亚大学的应用学院表明，每一个月或几乎每个月都有70.9％的女性，每月70.9％的女性在每月或几乎每月都有70.9％的妇女。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-menstrual-discomfort-discomfort-discomfort-mong-mong-mong-women-women-n-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-menstrual-discomfort-discomfort-discomfort-among-mong-women-women-women-pain-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e5a2-0da2-0db3-4918-bb27-72b27-72b7cd56b339 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:16:00 -0400 Study reveals high prevalence of menstrual discomfort among women in Spain
微小的面部运动可以帮助更好地了解自闭症患者的社交交流罗格斯大学新不伦瑞克省研究人员领导的一项研究表明，微小的面部运动 - 太少了，无法引起人们的注意 - 可以帮助科学家更好地了解自闭症患者的社交交流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tiny-facial-movements-could-help-better-better-socterd-soccial-social-social-social-social-communication in-autistic-indistivuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tiny-facial-movements-could-help-better-better-undercal-soccial-social-social-social-social-communication in-autistic-invidivuals.aspx#comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B6D92D48-1B80-49A6-A54B-96AC8C2E4053 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:09:13 -0400 Tiny facial movements could help better understand social communication in autistic individuals
征求紧急支持，因为美国资金削减威胁艾滋病毒/艾滋病计划面对对美国外国援助计划的持续资金中断，一群国际专家呼吁采取紧急行动，以确保挽救生命的干预措施以及对撒哈拉以南非洲艾滋病毒/艾滋病影响的儿童和家庭的支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/call-for-urgent-support-as-as-us-funding-cuts-threats-theaten-hivaids-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/call-for-urgent-support-as-as-us-funding-cuts-cuts-theaten-hivaids-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=C1B58C5-8CA3-4965-96FC-D0531AE9A2AE Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:07:00 -0400 Call for urgent support as US funding cuts threaten HIV/AIDS programs

雄性成对的小鼠表现出在协调恐惧反应的韧性面对潜在的威胁时，老鼠经常冻结。此外，当两只动物在一起时，它们通常同时冻结，与彼此的不动时期相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/male-female-pairs-of-mice-show-show-ishow-isilience-in-coordination-fear-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/male-female-pairs-of-mice-show-show-ishow-isilience-in-coordination-fear-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e70ddded0dddded0-f082-42be-87E5-5BA490CEEEEB Wed, 09 Apr 2025 01:28:00 -0400 Male-female pairs of mice show resilience in coordinating fear responses
